English: 1.4 million relics unveil the ups and downs of the mysterious ancient country ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 140万件文物揭开神秘古国的沧桑｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 17年迭代育种，破解“香蕉癌”｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: 2,000 kinds of costumes in Dunhuang murals lead the aesthetic trend ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 敦煌壁画2000种服饰引领审美潮流｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: 6800 years! Earliest remaining evidence of traditional Chinese medicine to date ｜ China Documentary.jpg

English: A milestone for Chinese and also for all mankind ｜ China Documentary.jpg

English: A street food named after fish ranks on the list of favorite snacks in Xuzhou ｜ China Documentary.jpg

English: A symbol that exists on 3 continents, the earliest known one was discovered here ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 横跨三大洲的符号，已知最早的符号在这里被发现｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Catch it if you want to eat! Only two Chinese manage the crab-catching technique ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 想吃就抓！仅两名中国人掌握捕蟹技术｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 中国农学家成功培育燃脂黄瓜｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Chinese submarine explores unknown seabed in Indian Ocean for the first time ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 中国潜艇首次探索印度洋未知海床｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Cut a piece of dried beancurd into 3,000 strands! Showtime for Chinese top chef ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 一块豆腐干切成3000条！中国顶级厨师的表演时间｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Don't underestimate it just because it's an ass ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 别因为它是驴就小看它｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: French missionary's discovery in Hebei reveal an untold chapter in the history ｜ China Documentary.jpg

Chinese: 常见问题：莫高窟能保存多久？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 嫦娥六号准备就绪！寒冬中的调度中心熙熙攘攘｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 中国西南部白马雪山上的高原明星｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: How come the preference for female offspring in snub-nosed monkey's tradition？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg

Chinese: 中国人是如何找到云冈石窟失落的造像的？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: How do ethnic Koreans in China make spicy sauce for stewing fish？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 中国朝鲜族是如何制作炖鱼的辣酱的？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 酱料是如何将新鲜的羊排做成“彩虹羊排”的？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 孙悟空如何抵御流浪雄猴的袭击，保护家人？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 中国将如何研究从月球背面采集的样本？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 典型的广东食材，在中国北方是如何“变装”的？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 中国疯了吗？小麦亩产要650公斤？ ｜ 中国纪录片.jpg

English: It turns out he's the man who named the West Lake in Hangzhou ｜ China Documentary.jpg

Chinese: 去探寻中国古籍里的美食 ｜ 中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 三伏天吃羊肉，医生远离我 ｜ 中国纪录片.jpg

English: New variety's high density tolerance doubled the yield of oilseed rape ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 新品种耐高密度栽培，油菜产量翻番 ｜ 中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 难怪是王牌！充饥、治病、纺成布匹……｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 海南红树林变幻莫测，唯有强者方能生存｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 腐竹制作这一步仍需手工操作｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 同时颠覆你对甜品和蒸菜的印象｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Seriously？ Sichuan people eat rabbit head？ Will you try this local delicacy？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 真的吗？四川人吃兔头？你会尝试这道地道美食吗？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: The 10-million-year-old migration： Chinese merganser choose to live here ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 千万年前的迁徙：中华秋沙鸭选择在此安家落户｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 一年一度的鹿王争霸赛开跑啦！哪只鹿能赢得交配权？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 最生动的流动市场：鸭、鹅、猪都“坐”上这列火车？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 中国唯一列入联合国教科文组织文化与自然遗产名录的公园｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 珍稀短命的竹菇如今走进寻常百姓家｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: The wildlife you may never notice in the bustling Hong Kong ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 繁华的香港，你可能从未注意到的野生动物｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 世界上最早的红茶产自武夷山｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: The ＂queen of the rainforest＂ lives in the world's most biodiverse regions ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: “雨林女王”生活在世界上生物多样性最丰富的地区｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: They know the most and the best ways to cook goose ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 他们最懂、最会做鹅｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: What food do Kazak herders rely on to get energy in the winter of -30°C？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 在零下30摄氏度的冬天，哈萨克族牧民靠什么食物来获取能量？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: What made Su Shi, an optimistic Capricorn, attempt suicide three times？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 是什么让乐观的摩羯座苏轼三次自杀？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: What secret hides in the kitchen where the ever-popular crayfish was made？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 制作广受欢迎的小龙虾的厨房里隐藏着什么秘密？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: When Chinese food spreads across the globe, will it be accepted or changed？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 当中国菜传遍世界，它会被接受还是被改变？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Where did all the stones chiseled out of the grottoes go？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 石窟里凿出来的石头都去哪儿了？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Which type of grass fed to cows raises milk yield & butterfat at the same time？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 喂奶牛吃什么草能同时提高产奶量和乳脂率？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 谁说中国没有唐代木结构建筑？｜中国纪录片.jpg

Chinese: 饶平人为何如此执着于鹅的大小？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Why do we need yellowish flour to cook the wok braised chicken？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 炒鸡为什么要用黄面？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: Why was Su Shi listed on the 12 great historical figures by French media？ ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 苏轼为何被法国媒体列入12位历史伟人之一？｜中国纪录片.jpg

English: With a history of 60 million years, they are the last wild horses on Earth ｜ China Documentary.jpg
Chinese: 拥有6000万年历史的野马，是地球上最后的野马｜中国纪录片.jpg
